answers.answer: Omg ladies!!! Stop the fighting and let's focus on positives
So you see now huh? Lol
Yes lol, I'm happy specially because I realized that whoever don't wanna be there, I don't care and I'm gonna enjoy it
How about u mami, how u doing?
Im good mama! I go for my membrane sweep tomorrow hopefully it gets something started
I was meaning to ask u, is that when they break ur water? Is it the same thing as induced?
Well it's suppose to help start contractions. It's not breaking your water bag, but ts when they move your water bag which releases something to help start contractions
Ohhh ok, I was confused with that because I heard someone said that when she has induced it hurt but my sister told me that I didn't hurt for her
I was induced my first pregnancy it didn't hurt me either, but everyone is different.
Ok, I'm doin my research lol, just in case

question: I'm so happy and so grateful that I'm almost on my 3rd trimester and everything is going great with my little boy, he's coming healthy, I have diabetes but is under control, I've gained 16 lbs so far, but the Dr told me is ok, because I'm almost done, and I feel him kicking and I think even punching me like crazy lol, I love when I'm "arguing" with him over the kicks but I love it, and it makes me feel more in love with him every time he does it, I'm gonna have my baby shower on Saturday, so I can start buying whatever I don't get, and I'm desperate to start putting the crib together and do my hospital bag, how about u ladies, how u feel?
